front.title: Kerberos V Authentication Mode for Uninitialized Klients

abstract.t: The Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) [1] includes an option that allows authentication of all DHCP messages, as specified in [2]. This document specifies a DHCP authentication mode based on Kerberos V tickets. This provides mutual authentication between a DHCP client and server, as well as authentication of all DHCP messages.
